column5: Sad news indeed. God Speed Bo!
Quite a career. Remember those commercials with the other Bo.... Jackson?  What will happen to Lucile?
He put the rock in rock n' roll.   So, so I been told.

Bo was unique....many artists today are good but when I think back on my life in relation to age one of the things that is so cool is I we lived through a period where the artist of yesterday was responsible for shaping artists of today.  Bye Bye BO!!!
